name: Ecuadorean Shrimp Ceviche
keywords: appetizer, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, onion, shrimp, tomato
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds small or medium shrimp, shelled and deveined
Juice and grated rind of 1/2 orange
2 ripe tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 fresh mild to hot red chili, seeded and finely chopped, or to taste
Salt and hot red pepper flakes to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine shrimp with lime juice, orange juice and orange rind. Allow to marinate at least eight hours.
Combine with remaining ingredients and refrigerate until ready to serve. Serve with popcorn on the side.
